GeneDef.label: nanites
GeneDef.description:
Carriers of this gene possess a mysterious nanomechanical device capable of self-replication through unknown means, requiring no apparent consumption of matter.

When equipped with Higher Dimensional Nanites, consciousness becomes independent of physical form - even after bodily destruction, the mind endures.

「FOUNDATION」
GeneDef.resourceDescription: Higher dimensional nanites are a type of nanomechanical device that is little known, capable of self-replicating without consumption through unknown methods.\n\nThis device possesses a variety of incredible functions, capable of manipulating molecular gravity and temporarily altering physical laws with sufficient reserves.
